name: Elevator Escapades
description:
Elevator Escapades puts you on an island with several towns. All of these towns have buildings with elevators inside, but all of the elevator buttons have been taken away!

It is up to you to go to each one of these small towns, and pass the challenge of each elevator wizard, in order to get the elevator buttons back. These challenges include quantity, sequence, character, and phoneme recognition challenges.

This game is focused on building pre-academic skills for kids who are about to start/have recently started school.

A video demonstration of the game is provided in the download section.

Controls:

- WASD/arrow keys = player movement

- Mouse & left-hand button is for interacting with buttons, challenges, and characters.

- Escape Key = exit game (game will save progress automatically).

- Keypad Enter Key = reset player position on current map.

**Characters, trees, bins, rocks, chimes and music sounds, letters, and numbers are all imported assets, and not original work. Everything else is original.**

Enjoy!
